attributes.action: No more local lockdowns or national lockdowns in England
attributes.additional_details:
Dont impose lockdowns 
Dont impose Local lockdowns
Dont impose national lockdown
People cant cope no more
attributes.background:
Since England went into lockdown in 2020 the country is losing lots of money
WARNING: IF U INTRODUCE LOCKDOWNS PEOPLE PROBABLY WONT LISTEN AND BREAK RULES.
Sign to keep England open forever

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove emergency powers that enable the Government to implement lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574243

Ensure that ALL Covid restrictions are lifted on June 21st 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584862
